wms_article.title: Shinsegae Duty Free partners with Marriott Bonvoy

wms_article_body.body: Shinsegae Duty Free said Tuesday it has signed a partnership with Marriott Bonvoy to launch a membership-linked program that combines hotel stays with duty-free shopping benefits. Customers who link their Shinsegae Duty Free and Marriott Bonvoy accounts can earn points and receive benefits at more than 9,600 Marriott-affiliated hotels across 143 countries and at Shinsegaeâ€™s online and offline duty-free stores. Marriott Bonvoy is the worldâ€™s largest hotel membership program with about 248 million members worldwide.
